sentences.sContent: Yeh, you marry them and u will get real good life such as cockroach for breakfast, scorpion for lunch and snake for dinner.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yeh, you marry them and u will get real good life such as cockroach for breakfast, scorpion for lunch and snake for dinner.
sentences.sCn: 耶，你要是和他们结婚，就可以过上真正的好生活，比如早餐吃蟑螂、午餐吃蝎子、晚餐吃蛇。

sentences.sContent: But such activity produces a healthy appetite and who could forgo the epicurean delight of fried scorpion, cockroach, grasshopper or locust stir-fry.
sentences.sContent_eng: But such activity produces a healthy appetite and who could forgo the epicurean delight of fried scorpion, cockroach, grasshopper or locust stir-fry.
sentences.sCn: 但是这样的活动让胃口变得好起来。谁又能放弃油煎蝎子、蟑螂、蚱蜢和爆炒知了带来的口福之乐呢？

trans.tranOther: a tropical animal like an insect, with a curving tail and a poisonous sting
